import React, { useContext } from "react";
import { ListingContext } from "../Context";
import { Container, Row, Col, ListGroup, Card, Badge } from "react-bootstrap";
import placeholder from "../placeholder.png";
import Listing from "./Listing"

function MainContent() {
  const [listings, setListings] = useContext(ListingContext);
  return (
    <main>
      <Container fluid>
        <Row>
          <Col lg={2}>
            <ListGroup className="my-4">
              <ListGroup.Item active>Category 1</ListGroup.Item>
              <ListGroup.Item>Category 2</ListGroup.Item>
              <ListGroup.Item>Category 3</ListGroup.Item>
            </ListGroup>
          </Col>
          <Col lg={10} className="my-4">
            <Row>
              <Listing />
              <Listing />
              <Listing />
              <Listing />
              <Listing />
              <Listing />
              <Listing />
              <Listing />
              <Listing />
              <Listing />
            </Row>
          </Col>
        </Row>
      </Container>
    </main>
  );
}

export default MainContent;
